author: Andrew Beaton
title: Why Patrick Reed and Rory McIlroy Are Both Wearing Pink at the Masters
text:
AUGUSTA, Ga.—On Sundays, we wear pink.
At least that’s the case for the Nike-outfitted golfers here at Augusta National for the final round of the Masters. And the pink shirts mean the tournament’s favorite won’t be in his usual Sunday garb.
Patrick Reed, who enters Sunday with a three-stroke lead at 14 under par, typically wears a red shirt...
